website_summaries.verdict: Works well with small vessels like kayaks, canoes, paddleboards.
pros: Complete kit includes a folding anchor, padded storage bag, and 25-foot marine-grade rope
cons: Lacks holding power for anything larger than a canoe
If you upgrade your boating vessel, you will have to upgrade your anchor, too

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for kayak....
customer_reviews.text: Great quality and stores perfectly within my kayak storage area behind the seat. The bag is padded and sturdy, eliminating concern that the anchor could tear through the material. I typically kayak rivers and creeks, but this year I have my kayak at a great fishing lake. This anchor should be exactly what I need in order to camp out at fishing spots for extended periods of time. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: D. LP07

customer_reviews.title: Great anchor
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my kayak, it's much easier to use than the 10lb anchor it replaced. The fitment of the ring that locks the claws could be better but overall function is not affected.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: If no wind it works great
customer_reviews.text: Well it works but it dont hold. I bought this for or small fishing raft . If there is any wind even a slight breeze it won't hold but if I go close to shore and hook on a rock or stick in sand it holds. If no wind it hold raft great.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Ordered 2 of these for our 2 sea doos. We ski in inshore gulf waters with a sandy bottom. I was concerned that these may be too small to anchor a 600lb ski but the anchors did a great job in 15mph winds with currents. The fold up nicely and store easily. I would recommend these to anyone looking for a compact ski anchor
customer_reviews.author: Clark Hainen

customer_reviews.title: Beats anything Academy offers
customer_reviews.text: I started off going to Academy and couldn't find anything under 20 bucks that was worth it. I found this online and the quality of the bag and the fact it comes with the rope and clip makes it well worth it. I highly recommend this product. It was near 20 bucks just for the anchor itself at Academy.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla

customer_reviews.title: Great anchor for Ozarks streams
customer_reviews.text: This anchor works perfectly for Ozarks streams and lakes with my dirigo 140. The rope seems to be good quality and the length is fine for my uses. I took off the buoy as I am using a scotty anchor trolley on my kayak and put a better knot on the end as I didn't think it would hold up well. The bag is sturdy and will even hold my trolley as well. The anchor keeps me in place on windy Stockton lake and on the swift current on the rivers as they are near flood stage. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathon Carden

customer_reviews.title: Go buy it at a brick and mortar
customer_reviews.text: Looks very nice however when I opened the package the ripe was frayed. Not the end of the world just sucks its messed up before I even used it. Amazon returns are in pain is the ass lately. Just canceled my membership. From now on local only or I’ll just make it myself. Rant off
customer_reviews.author: Mish

customer_reviews.title: Handy little anchor for paddleboarding
customer_reviews.text: I use this when paddleboarding Very useful for just floating around without having to worry about drifting
customer_reviews.author: MIke D

customer_reviews.title: Rusty Right out the Box
customer_reviews.text: The product works as designed to anchor a jetski, kayak, or paddle board great is the reason for the 2 stars. The problem is it came straight out the package with rust on both anchors I bought.
customer_reviews.author: Bubba Chucks

customer_reviews.title: This product has been great! I brought it with me on my family ...
customer_reviews.text: This product has been great! I brought it with me on my family vacation to Florida and it was easy to transport. The soft bag also presented it from scratching anything else I brought as well as the anchor itself. The padded bag also prevented scratching on my board. While using, the green color made it easy to find. Finally, the folding aspects of the anchor worked really well and it was able to grip across a variety of surfaces (sandy, muddy, etc...). I would highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Molly Moore

customer_reviews.title: Works well, small size and it keeps me from moving for such a small and light weight anchor
customer_reviews.text: I found a simple place to put it by removing a bit of styrofoam and it slides in well in the pouch, I put a simple eye bolt on the top out of the way for it to clip to and it works perfect. I've had it within 3 feet of running out of rope, but most of my kayaking is shallow water. If it holds up, and it looks like it should, I a happy camper
customer_reviews.author: Jon Margrave

customer_reviews.title: Great for small boats
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for my inflatable boat and it works great. Easy to store, easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Will Hamel

customer_reviews.title: Great for Paddle Board Yoga
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my paddle board. The factory tied the rope incorrectly but you can find the correct way on YouTube. Great item, very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: LMP

customer_reviews.title: Great for kayaks
customer_reviews.text: Took it fishing on a river in my kayak and it works perfectly. Just enough to keep you in place and small enough it takes up no room on your boat.
customer_reviews.author: Boston shopoer

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: I can't review the actual performance of this anchor because the governor of NJ closed the boat ramps so I'm not going out for a while anyway. Delivery was quick considering the situation with the virus and the product looks great. I'm sure it will be adequate for my need, holding a 10' boat in place on lakes and rivers.
customer_reviews.author: RaQue

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT KAYAK ANCHOR!
customer_reviews.text: I've used it dozens of times now, mud, rock, weedy areas. Kayak stays put. Great value, and the bag is especially helpful in containing the ample rope.
customer_reviews.author: thm1075

customer_reviews.title: Met expectations
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to hold 2 SOP boards on a lazy river to just float in the middle. Works great and glad I got it.
customer_reviews.author: SAP

customer_reviews.title: Awesome value.
customer_reviews.text: I use this anchor for my small kayak in the lake I fish at. It’s perfect weight to keep me still even on windy days. I love that I can throw it into the carry bag so it’s easy to transport. Plus, it’s durable and compact.
customer_reviews.author: Reid Zuerlein

customer_reviews.title: Seems to be good but...
customer_reviews.text: I haven't used it yet as I am in Chicago- not San Diego. Rope could be longer though, like some other anchor spools to attach to bowl muck drop style anchors... which I have also.
customer_reviews.author: NomadMan

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: thing is great looks and feels alot better than some cheap Walmart one that I had and a blade broke off from a imperfect casting
customer_reviews.author: Awestun

customer_reviews.title: Great for fresh water not for salt water
customer_reviews.text: It s a good kayak anchor works well, however, it is not made for salt water even though it is coated, after the first time in the water and after it was washed thoroughly with fresh water it is starting to rust at the base of the tines.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel F.

customer_reviews.title: Great little anchor ⚓
customer_reviews.text: This anchor does everything I need it to do... It holds 2 large paddleboards in place pretty well.
customer_reviews.author: Big D

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for what we needed it for
customer_reviews.text: We used this on our kayak and it worked perfectly. It seems very sturdy and hopefully will last awhile!
customer_reviews.author: Angelina G. Rafatti

customer_reviews.title: Great anchor for small inflatable boat.
customer_reviews.text: The rope provided could be longer. The anchor does keep my inflatable raft from drifting when lake fishing.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: a must buy for paddle boarding for the day
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! I really works. we paddle out and anchor down and we do not move. AA+
customer_reviews.author: ARW/EVM

customer_reviews.title: Great for kayaking calm waters.
customer_reviews.text: Good quality and just the right size for my needs. Stuff sack is very durable and I like the high visibility paint scheme.
customer_reviews.author: Topomon

customer_reviews.title: Good but cheap rope.
customer_reviews.text: Love the anchor and the float set up with the clip. Gave a 3 for durability due to the rope its already staring to fray.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Green Anchor
customer_reviews.text: Great anchor just had to re-line the rope to the front. Looks perfect and first trial is tomorrow so more info to come
customer_reviews.author: Lorne

customer_reviews.title: Great anchor for kayaks!
customer_reviews.text: I like the vibrant color of this anchor. I use it to anchor my kayak in the water.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Berry

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a Seadoo Spark!
customer_reviews.text: The first product I ordered was defective so instead of a refund, I opted for a replacement. The replacement works great! I used this on my Seadoo Spark and clipped it to the front. It works great in deep parts of the lake as well as the sandbar. I’m happy with my order!
customer_reviews.author: McKenzie Schodowski

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Works amazing on my kayak. Sure it would work well on my canoe and any other smaller water craft. Plus the colors awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Gold boy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for use with Inflatable SUP
customer_reviews.text: I love that it's easy to see in the water. It grabs the sand under the water easily and holds me in place.
customer_reviews.author: Sean M Hennen

customer_reviews.title: Nice anchor
customer_reviews.text: Love this anchor! Would recommend getting zip ties and tying the string to the bottom and a zip tie to the top loop so you don’t lose it though.
customer_reviews.author: Victor

customer_reviews.title: very nice little anchor
customer_reviews.text: very nice little anchor. I got this to go with a paddle board for my nephew. he has used it many time in the river to keep the board from being carried away by the current while he gets off to swim around.
customer_reviews.author: Roxanne

customer_reviews.title: Works great for yak and canoe
customer_reviews.text: Just as described. I bought this anchor for my yak but used it today for my canoe and it worked great. The rope that it comes with is stiff and 25’ so I changed it out for a better quality 50’ rope and it works great. Would buy again
customer_reviews.author: motorsport70

customer_reviews.title: Yay!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. Holds 4 tubes and 2 kayaks in a steady current.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Good deal
customer_reviews.text: Very nice for the money using it for fishing on my kayak
customer_reviews.author: feat70

customer_reviews.title: Works great.
customer_reviews.text: Works great for my 12 foot kayak. Do the modification with a zip tie for when you get hung up. You can look it up on YouTube on how to.
customer_reviews.author: S

customer_reviews.title: 2 kayaks in the bay
customer_reviews.text: I anchored two kayaks in the bay of port st joe with this anchor worked really well. I haven’t tried it in any current yet, but I doubt I’ll be disappointed. Padded bag is really nice. Doesn’t rattle and make any noise while in the car on the way to the bay.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey

customer_reviews.title: Durable, Compact, Green!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect set, it has everything I need and fits into the nice, compact, thickly padded bag...and the green. I also received it in 2 days even though it wasn't through Prime.
customer_reviews.author: Pat

customer_reviews.title: Not good Enough for a Jet ski
customer_reviews.text: Did not hold in place my Kawasaki STX-15F 2019, Bought because I saw a good review that it was good for a Jetski. I lost the shipping cost returning it. :-(
customer_reviews.author: Pablo Romero

customer_reviews.title: Great Product. Vibrant Color. Super Useful for kayakers
customer_reviews.text: Great green color that is nice and visible in water Love the padded bag. Doesnt scratch my boat. Folding anchor holds extremely well on all different kinds of surfaces. Great product that will be super helpful for summer time
customer_reviews.author: Kremp

customer_reviews.title: Nice anchor
customer_reviews.text: Could have used a longer rope . I replaced the rope. The anchor works great
customer_reviews.author: munster

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my Kayak
customer_reviews.text: This is just what I needed to fish from my Kayak!
customer_reviews.author: PyroBuyer

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Slip collar broke on the first use, can no longer stay folded up are down. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Loved this till I lost it, left at the lake. I hope they restock...... can't get again right now.
customer_reviews.author: S. Richardson

customer_reviews.title: As expected good quality
customer_reviews.text: Great anchor, comes with high quality bag to pack away in, perfect for canoeing trips
customer_reviews.author: Csaturday

customer_reviews.title: Nice anchor
customer_reviews.text: Holds the wave runner and stores away better than a mushroom anchor. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I Like It
customer_reviews.text: Very nice Kayak Anchor. I'm happy. It comes in a padded bag that keeps it from scuffing up your kayak when not in use.
customer_reviews.author: Just Me

customer_reviews.title: Good anchor
customer_reviews.text: Works great, I did change out the line to a longer smaller diameter one but it works great
customer_reviews.author: Keith Ellison

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: This was a used product. That information should have been included in the sale description.
customer_reviews.author: Roberta John

customer_reviews.title: Maybe good for a 10ft yak
customer_reviews.text: My 14' Hobie was dragging this anchore through the mud.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Great for kayak mooring
customer_reviews.text: Would have liked a longer cord, but you can easily add on your own. Works great in both silt and rocky bottoms.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Treves

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my husband since he loves to fish out on the kayak at the beach and he says he loves it!
customer_reviews.author: LeeAnna

customer_reviews.title: Green color looks great and helps with visibility in the water
customer_reviews.text: Green color looks great and helps with visibility in the water. The padded bag is really nice which helps by eliminating any scratching. Folding anchor holds extremely well.
customer_reviews.author: Charles F Bronson

customer_reviews.title: Just right!
customer_reviews.text: My grandson uses this for his kayak and really likes it!
customer_reviews.author: Gram

customer_reviews.title: ITS HORRIBLE
customer_reviews.text: This is the worst anchor I have ever bought! Not only does it not lock into the open position it doesn’t grab very well at all and it’s already rusting!
customer_reviews.author: Santos

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I haven't used it yet but looks good and matches my new Vibe Sea Ghost 130, Green camo

customer_reviews.title: Perfect item
customer_reviews.text: Fast shipping item was just what I needed , works great

customer_reviews.title: Not heavy enough
customer_reviews.text: Wasn’t able to keep my seadoo in place on a very still lake.

customer_reviews.title: Good but rusts quickly
customer_reviews.text: Good product but it was not painted good and rusted quickly.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for paddle board. High quality. Carrying bag makes it easy to keep together. Very happy with product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works well on any under water terrain!
customer_reviews.text: Works really well! IMO there is no better or peaceful place to do yoga then on the water. This folding anchor holds extremely well on varying underwater terrain and doesn’t scratch my board. Highly recomend!
customer_reviews.author: Brian Leonard

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is brilliant...a high quality, must own product for any paddle boarder!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome anchor
customer_reviews.text: Works well with my Sea-Doo fish bro even when it’s windy

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: The buoy -is durable and I love the throw the bag for easy storage

customer_reviews.title: It wasnt new.....used
customer_reviews.text: It wasn't in new condition. It was used. It had seaweed on it. GROSS

customer_reviews.title: Love the green color as it really helps with visibility
customer_reviews.text: Love the green color as it really helps with visibility. The best part is the paddle bag will never scratch the board!! Fantastic product
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great accessory for my new fishing kayak
customer_reviews.text: Great accessory for my new fishing kayak! Perfect length and weight for cove fishing. Fits in the bag great! Good purchase!
customer_reviews.author: jeffry

customer_reviews.title: • Green color looks great and helps with visibility in the water • Padded ...
customer_reviews.text: • Green color looks great and helps with visibility in the water • Padded bag won't scratch the board • Folding anchor holds extremely well on varying underwater surfaces (including rocky, sandy, and muddy) I am a yoga instructor in the Summer and look forward to purchasing more for my business.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Another great product from Gradient
customer_reviews.text: Another great product from Gradient! I got this as a gift for my parents who love kayaking whenever they can. They could not be happier with this product. They especially like the bright green color because it's not only stylish but also much easier to see in the water than anchors they've had in the past. There is also no need to worry about your board or kayak being scratched by the anchor because the padded bag included with the anchor does a great job protecting! The best part is how sturdy this anchor is and how well it holds you in place even in rougher waters and even mud! I would absolutely recommend this product and company!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Kayak Anchor
customer_reviews.text: Use this as a kayak anchor for fishing. Works perfectly with an anchor trolley and holds my 10 foot fishing kayak well. Bag is not super tough but I don't use it anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Rick A Iverson

customer_reviews.title: Yaking!!
customer_reviews.text: Looks like it’s gonna be a great anchor for my Yak, will be using it tomorrow.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Really nicely made and works awesome to hold our 21' Hobie Island
customer_reviews.author: Deep Space

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised!
customer_reviews.text: I have utilized the anchor in a few different environments including large lakes and rivers with varying currents and bottoms. It performed on all with no issues. The anchor folds up nicely and is well designed.
customer_reviews.author: nick gordon

customer_reviews.title: High Quality Product
customer_reviews.text: Really cool product. Never knew I needed this, but will be perfect for using my paddle board. High quality and easy to carry.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Gradient Fitness Marine Anchor, 3.5 lb Folding Anchor, Grapnel Anchor Kit for Kayaks, Canoes, Paddle Boards (SUP), (3.5 lbs)
feature_bullets: FOLDING ANCHOR: Our 3.5 lb 4-fluke folding anchor is compact and convenient. Included is a padded draw string storage bag that is perfect for the outdoor person on-the-go.
CONVENIENCE: The anchor folds into a 12” x 3” size and slips into a fully padded storage bag that will prevent scratches to your board, kayak, or Jet Ski.

MARINE GRADE: The anchor is rust resistant with 25 feet of green/black marine grade rope (7mm thick). It also includes a PVC flotation buoy and stainless steel snap hook for quick and easy connections.

DESIGNED FOR THE OUTDOORS: From SUP Yoga to fishing from a kayak we’ve got you covered. The anchor is easy to use, storage friendly, and ideal for environments of any kind. Whether it’s sandy, weedy, muddy, or rocky our anchor will hold.

BORN IN THE USA – Gradient Fitness is proudly owned and operated out of Rochester, NY. We stand behind our products! Not satisfied with your product? Return it to us within 90 days and get 100% of your money back!
